body: Well, my name is enough, right?

Well, I usually cringe at BBC crap, because while it's tru races differ in the penis size (and in women with breast size as well), but not every black guy's THAT ginormous. But it does kinda piss me off. When somebody doesn't like blackwashing a character (like in Netflix's The Witcher) it;s racism on twatter, but if it's stereotyping and generalizing that black cocks are the longest, biggest, just THE best... nobody speaks of racism. Because it's... good racism, I guess? And I find it hillarious. I laff many times when I see this. Not everytime, but often. This work, though, was really good. Really dig the artstyle, the blows were a sight, and the overall feel of the chapter was nice. 7-7,5/10
